name: Laura Smith, RMT
about: My name is Laura. After 3 years of college I worked in several daycare where I utilized my knowledge in the infant, toddle and school age rooms. After working in daycare centres I dedicated more than 10 years of my life working as a full and part-time nanny, taking care of newborns, toddlers and school age children. I am also trained with Dona international as a Birth and Postpartum Doula.  More over, I now Coach families with everyday parenting challenges. As a Nanny, Babysitter, Doula and Parenting Coach I encourages Compassion, Understanding, Team Work, A Judgment Free Space, Good Communication Skills, Open Mindedness, Creativity, Love and Respect.

reviews.name: Jessica
reviews.comment: Patient, friendly, kind and loving. She is great with my Twins and I plan to hire her over and over! Happy to be a reference.

reviews.name: Jenny
reviews.comment: She is a true “goddess” in the world of doula practice: a real-world professional, with passion and eternal love for what she does.

reviews.name: Susan
reviews.comment: My family was truly blessed to have such an incredible person, honest and sincere friend.

reviews.name: Mary
reviews.comment: If you are hesitating to hire a doula, I would recommend you look no further and meet with Laura to understand the benefits of her support.
